title: Da Nao Xiyou
synopsis: Toy Sun Wuyuan considers himself the Monkey King, but is ridiculed in the toy world for not being able to take out the golden hoop. By chance, Sun Wuyuan entered the world of Journey to the West alone, and ran into Monkey King who was driven back to Huaguo Mountain. Sun Wuyuan, who wanted the golden hoop, was stalked, and Sun Wukong reluctantly offered the condition: Sun Wuyuan would worship him as a teacher, and give him the golden hoop after he finished his studies. Unexpectedly, the Bull Demon provoke secretly and instigated Wu Yuan to steal the golden hoop and snatch it away. Five Yuan, who hurriedly fled back to the toy world, discovered that the world has been ruled by cattle...(translated from douban)
